song.title: Glory Knight
song.info:
5th in the Bush Party 1995 Multichannel Music competition.
-------------------- " Glory Knight " composed by MIKE X & Ghoul of Xenon Development -------------------- Samples from: - Dream Theater - Clawfinger - Queensryche - Korg 05R/W - Purple Motion - LizardKing - Vouge # Written in 1 day # Result: about 3 minutes of sound Greets : - All in Xenon - Harry, Agnar, EW, TW Zork, PCK, RMH, ... - and the 76 others who I forgot...sorry --------------------- If you want to get in touch with me, just write to: Michal Karpinski Alfheimsvingen 22 7026 Trondheim NORWAY
..or you can give me a call at : (+47) 72 556201 =================
MCMXCV =================
sorry....
